description: Simple, endless sheets of Bubble wrap for your popping enjoyment. Pop all the bubbles on the screen and a new sheet will appear.   Or, Choose the reinflate bubbles option in preference and the bubbles will randomly reinflate on their own.   Preferences also include turning on or off the tough to pop partial bubblesones on the edges of the screen.  Includes a selection of bubblewrap popping sound effects!!  From CD quality, real bubblewrap pops to a whimisical "boing" sound.  The custom sounds can be turned off to use the super fast default "whoosh" pop sound from the original BubbleWrapLite.  Relaxing fun. That is all there is to it.  The latest version simplifies the custom sound selections and adds the option to upgrade to the full bubblewrap version.
